descriptionHtml:
[color=green]Got some requests after I posted an image with a preset I made to upload the save/preset somewhere.
But due to the nature of how they tend to work out with mod conflicts I decided to upload an .npc file instead.
PS: I\'m not going to explain how to use this. There\'s [url=www.google.com]Google[/url] for that if you really want to know.[/color]

You can use it to add a new preset to the Dagi-Raht race with the Creation Kit.


[color=red]This .NPC file probably looks strange on any race except the Dagi-Raht female.[/color]


[heading][color=yellow]It includes[/color][/heading]
dagirahtcear.npc


[heading][color=yellow]Credits[/color][/heading]
nuska - For such an amazing race.
author: ErikRedbeard
